languages.text: "Надеюсь, теперь его душа пылает так же ярко, как пылали его жертвы".
"I hope his soul now burns as bright as his victims did."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, теперь его душа пылает так же ярко, как пылали его жертвы".

traits.locale_text: "I hope his soul now burns as bright as his victims did."
"I hope his soul now burns as bright as his victims did."
"I hope his soul now burns as bright as his victims did."
"I hope his soul now burns as bright as his victims did."
"I hope his soul now burns as bright as his victims did."

languages.text: “我希望他的灵魂能像他手下那些受害者一样熊熊燃烧。”
languages.original_text: "I hope his soul now burns as bright as his victims did."

traits.locale_text: “我希望他的灵魂能像他手下那些受害者一样熊熊燃烧。”

languages.text: «Espero que su alma arda de la misma forma que ardieron sus víctimas».
languages.original_text: "I hope his soul now burns as bright as his victims did."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que su alma arda de la misma forma que ardieron sus víctimas».

languages.text: 「彼の魂が、その被害者と同じ明るさで焼かれていることを願う」
languages.original_text: "I hope his soul now burns as bright as his victims did."

traits.locale_text: 「彼の魂が、その被害者と同じ明るさで焼かれていることを願う」

languages.text: "Hoffentlich brennt seine Seele jetzt ebenso lichterloh wie seine Opfer."
languages.original_text: "I hope his soul now burns as bright as his victims did."

traits.locale_text: "Hoffentlich brennt seine Seele jetzt ebenso lichterloh wie seine Opfer."

languages.text: « J'espère que son âme brûle aujourd'hui plus fort encore que le corps de ses victimes en leur temps. »
languages.original_text: "I hope his soul now burns as bright as his victims did."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que son âme brûle aujourd'hui plus fort encore que le corps de ses victimes en leur temps. »

languages.text: "Umarım ruhu da kurbanları gibi cayır cayır yanıyordur."
languages.original_text: "I hope his soul now burns as bright as his victims did."

traits.locale_text: "Umarım ruhu da, kurbanları gibi cayır cayır yanıyordur."
